class.name: DWTypes
class.brief_description: Utility container for DataWiz schema metadata and enums exposed to GDScript.
class.description: `DWTypes` exposes enumerations used by the DataWiz runtime, most notably [enum TableType], so that your scripts can declare how tables should be categorized. Instances of this class are created internally; scripts usually interact with its enums and the [code]Schema[/code] dictionaries returned by [class DWService].

constants.constant: Default table category for persistent gameplay data.
Table optimized for append-only logging or audit trails.
Category intended for ephemeral runtime state.
Scratch space for temporary calculations and caches.
Queue-style table used for background jobs or messaging patterns.
Denotes tables that hold global singleton data driven by [class DWAutoLoad].
